articles.author: John Fritze
articles.title: New York Times: Upside-down US flag flew at home of Justice Samuel Alito after 2020 election - CNN
articles.description: An upside-down American flag – a symbol used by some supporters of former President Donald Trump who challenged the legitimacy Joe Biden’s 2020 victory – hung outside the home of Supreme Court Justice Samuel Alito after the election, The New York Times report…
articles.content: An upside-down American flag a symbol used by some supporters of former President Donald Trump who challenged the legitimacy of Joe Bidens 2020 victory  hung outside the home of Supreme Court Justice… [+2690 chars]
